#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
int dp[1025],a[106];
int car[1025];
int solve(int c)
{
	int temp=0;
	while(c>0){
		int k=c%10;
		temp|=(1<<k);
		c/=10;
	}
	return temp;
}
int main()
{
	int n;
	while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF){
	memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
	memset(car,0,sizeof(car));
	car[0]=0;
	dp[0]=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
	scanf("%d",&a[i]);
	int bt=solve(a[i]);
	for(int j=0;j<1024;j++){
		if(!(bt&j)){
			int b=bt|j;
			if(dp[b]<a[i]+dp[j]){
				dp[b]=dp[j]+a[i];
				car[b]=car[j]+1;
			}
			else if(dp[b]==a[i]+dp[j]){
				car[b]=max(car[b],car[j]+1);
			}
		}
	}
   }
   int ans=0,maxi=-1;
	for(int i=0;i<1024;i++){
		if(dp[i]>maxi){
			maxi=dp[i];
			ans=car[i];
		}
		else if(dp[i]==maxi){
			ans=max(ans,car[i]);
		}
	}
	printf("%d\n",ans);
}
   return 0;
}
